| A goblin shaman:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                   |

A **goblin shaman**, o, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SporkHack](/wiki/SporkHack "SporkHack") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). The goblin shaman is an [orcish](/wiki/Orc_\(monster_class\) "Orc (monster class)") monster that can cast spells similar to a [kobold shaman](/wiki/Kobold_shaman "Kobold shaman"), but they are slightly faster and more common.

A goblin shaman will attempt to cast one clerical [monster spell](/wiki/Monster_spell "Monster spell") during each of its turns.

In SporkHack, [eating](/wiki/Eating "Eating") a goblin shaman [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") confers [telepathy](/wiki/Telepathy "Telepathy") as with most spellcasting monsters, and raises the [hero](/wiki/Hero "Hero")'s [current telepathy](/wiki/Partial_intrinsic "Partial intrinsic") by 1⁄20 (+5%).

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Goblin_shaman_\(SporkHack\)\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Goblin shaman (SporkHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
o goblin shaman (No tile)
Difficulty 4
Attacks Spell-casting 0d0 clerical
o goblin shaman (No tile)
Difficulty 4
Attacks

Spell-casting 0d0 clerical

Base level 2
Base experience 17
Speed 9
Base AC 10
Base MR 0
Alignment -4 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 400
Nutritional value 100
Size Small
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed Telepathy (+5%, SporkHack only)

A goblin shaman:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.

A goblin shaman, o, is a type of monster that appears in SporkHack and SlashTHEM. The goblin shaman is an orcish monster that can cast spells similar to a kobold shaman, but they are slightly faster and more common.

A goblin shaman will attempt to cast one clerical monster spell during each of its turns.

In SporkHack, eating a goblin shaman corpse or tin confers telepathy as with most spellcasting monsters, and raises the hero's current telepathy by 1⁄20 (+5%).

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Goblin_shaman_(SporkHack)&oldid=175265"

A '''goblin shaman''', {{green|o}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[SporkHack]] and [[SlashTHEM]]. The goblin shaman is an [[Orc (monster class)|orcish]] monster that can cast spells similar to a [[kobold shaman]], but they are slightly faster and more common.

A goblin shaman will attempt to cast one clerical [[monster spell]] during each of its turns.

In SporkHack, [[eating]] a goblin shaman [[corpse]] or [[tin]] confers [[telepathy]] as with most spellcasting monsters, and raises the [[hero]]'s [[Partial intrinsic|current telepathy]] by {{frac|20}} (+5%).
